titles.title: Cultivating Learning Assistance for Student Success Act

To direct the Secretary of Education to establish a pilot program to provide grants to secondary schools for assistive technology devices and assistive technology services and to create programs to benefit students with autism or apraxia, and for other purposes.
Cultivating Learning Assistance for Student Success Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Cultivating Learning Assistance for Student Success Act
This bill directs the Department of Education to establish a pilot program to award grants to public or private secondary schools to benefit students with autism or apraxia. (Apraxia is the loss or impairment of the ability to execute complex coordinated movements without muscular or sensory impairment.)
